Combat
Hit Points: 210 Initiative: 4 Armor Class: 15 Attacks Per Round: 2
Armor Proficiency: Light; Medium; Shield Weapon Proficiency: Improvised; Martial Weapons; Simple Weapons
Armor: Leather Shield: None Weapons: Javelin (+10 1d6+4 R30/120); Pike (+10 1d10+4); Shortsword (+10 1d6+4); Unarmed (+10 1d4+4)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +100
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +4
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +4
Extra Attack: +1 Attacks Per Round
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Strength Damage Adjustment: +4
Tavern Brawler: Weapon Proficiency (Improvised)/Unarmed attacks inflict 1d4 HP
Tough: +40 Hit Points
Unarmored Defense (Barbarian): +5 Armor Class in no armor
Brutal Critical: Melee critical hits inflict 3 additional dice of damage
Demolishing Might: Melee weapons inflict x2 damage vs. objects and +1d8 HP vs. constructs
Dual Wielder: +1 Armor Class when wielding two melee weapons/Can use two-weapon fighting with any one-handed weapons/Can draw or stow two weapons simultaneously
Feral Instinct: Has advantage on initiative/Can rage and then act when surprised
Hurricane Strike: Can leap after pushing a foe to knock it prone (save DC 18 Strength negates), and pushing a foe allows an adjacent ally to use a reaction for a melee attack
Persistent Rage: Can continue raging when unengaged with any foe
Rage: Can enter a rage, gaining +4 damage with Strength melee weapons, for 1 min unlimited times per long rest; heavy armor negates benefits
Reckless Attack: Can suffer foe advantage on attacks to gain advantage on Strength melee attacks for 1 rd
Resolute Stance: Can suffer disadvantage on weapon attacks to gain immunity to grappling and to inflict disadvantage on foe attacks
Spirit Of The Mountain: Cannot be knocked prone or forced to move along the ground during rage
Tavern Brawler: Can use a bonus action to grapple after a successful unarmed or improvised attack
Thunderous Blows: Can push a foe 10' with a successful attack (save Huge foe DC 18 Strength negates)
Unstoppable: Cannot be slowed, frightened, knocked prone, paralyzed, or stunned during rage
Save Proficiency: Constitution; Strength
Save: Charisma: 4; Constitution: 11; Dexterity: 4; Intelligence: 3; Strength: 10; Wisdom: -1
Save Notes:
Danger Sense: Has advantage on Dexterity vs. visible dangers
Rage: Has advantage on Strength saves and resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage during rage
Relentless Rage: Can make a DC 10 Constitution save to retain 1 hit point when brought to 0 hit points; each use adds 5 to the DC until a short rest
Magic
Magic Notes: Rage: Cannot cast or concentrate on spells during rage
